options.command: if [ -d ./cmd ] && [ -n "$(find ./cmd -name '*.go' | head -1)" ]; then go build -o ../../dist/apps/video_conversor/main ./cmd; else echo 'No cmd directory or Go files found, skipping build'; fi
if [ -n "$(find . -name '*.go' -not -path './vendor/*' | head -1)" ]; then go test ./... -v -coverprofile=coverage.out; else echo 'No Go files found, skipping tests'; fi
if [ -n "$(find . -name '*.go' -not -path './vendor/*' | head -1)" ]; then golangci-lint run ./...; else echo 'No Go files found, skipping lint'; fi
